name: tandoor-recipes
description: Tandoor Recipes is a self-hosted recipe manager that supports meal planning, shopping lists, and nutritional analysis with a polished, multi-user web interface.
features: Recipe management: Store and organize recipes with ingredients, instructions, images, and tags in a searchable database.
Meal planning: Plan meals for days or weeks ahead with drag-and-drop calendar interface and automatic shopping list generation.
Shopping lists: Generate consolidated shopping lists from planned meals with automatic quantity calculations and category grouping.
Nutritional analysis: View detailed nutritional information for recipes and meals to track calories, macros, and dietary goals.
Multi-user support: Share recipes and meal plans with family members while maintaining individual preferences and permissions.
Recipe import: Import recipes from websites automatically using URL parsing or manual entry with structured templates.
Scaling: Adjust recipe serving sizes automatically with proportional ingredient recalculation for any number of servings.
Cookbook organization: Create custom cookbooks and collections to group recipes by theme, cuisine, or occasion.
Search and filter: Find recipes quickly using full-text search, tags, ingredients, ratings, and custom filters.
Mobile responsive: Access recipes and shopping lists from any device with a polished, touch-friendly interface.
Recipe sharing: Export recipes in standard formats or share via links with customizable privacy settings.
Cooking mode: Display recipes in a clean, step-by-step view optimized for use while cooking in the kitchen.
